Class Tile

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Tile

public class Tile
extends greenfoot.Actor

Třída Tile odpovídá vždy jen jednomu z políček a charakterizuje jejo stav a polohu.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jakub Kubišta

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever the Tile wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
